# [Interview #984: Rithmatist Signing Report - Nesh, Entry #2](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=984#2)

#### Nesh

So I asked whether the Teoish and Duladen could get their own magic systems.

#### Brandon Sanderson (paraphrased)

The answer was theoretically yes.
